1: I lift my voice in praise to the Divine.
2: I celebrate and honor this name forever.
3: I praise the divine from sunrise to sunset.
4: Divine greatness shines brightly across the world and beyond.
5: Nothing compares to the greatness of the divine presence.
6: I humble myself to appreciate the wonders of heaven and earth.
7: I rise from humble beginnings to a better life.
8: I join with the leaders of my community.
9: I celebrate the joyful blessings of motherhood.
